::Ramulus::

Ramulus nods, looking ahead of him. "Sounds bad. If we Maximals didn't look 
out for one another, we wouldn't be here right now."

He looks ahead of him, realizing that that was the truth. The years of the 
Neo Beast Wars had been hard on the Maximals, nearing them to extinction more 
than once. But they had survived, through every fall they had taken.
